item.title: Windowopen開新視窗並Post資料
item.description: 前言 一般用window.open開窗傳遞參數常用get方式在url後方串接參數 若想用post方式，則在開窗前模擬form submit post 並在onsubmit前open。 主要內容 function openPostWindow(url, name, val1, val2) { var tempForm = document.createElement("form"); tempForm.id = "tempForm1"; tempForm.method = "post"; tempForm.action = url; //url tempForm.target = name; let hideInput = document.createElement("input"); hideInput.type = "hidden"; hideInput.name = "val1";//傳入引數名 hideInput.value = val1;//傳入資料 tempForm.appendChild(hideInput); let hideInput2 = document.createElement("input"); hideInput2.type = "hidden"; hideInput2.name = "val2"; hideInput2.value = val2; tempForm.appendChild(hideInput2); tempForm.addEventListener('onsubmit', function () { openWindow(name);}) document.body.appendChild(tempForm); //手動submit form tempForm.
